articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: How a single tweet about a London, Ont., cricket plant became a flourishing conspiracy theory | CBC News
articles.description: A London, Ont., cricket factory that produces insects used as pet food is at the heart of a sweeping international conspiracy theory whose purveyors claim a global cabal of shadowy elites is trying to force people to eat bugs.
articles.content: A London, Ont., cricket factory that produces insects used as pet food has found itself at the heart of a sweeping international conspiracy theory whose purveyors claim a cabal of shadowy elites are … [+9118 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
